body: Thanks for posting! You are right, MLflow shoudl return 400 code in this case. Can you provide details about the store you use? I am assuming this was a Sqlalchemy store?
I have also run into this issue. I was using a PostgreSQL backend, so yes, sqlalchemy was involved.

wasn't able to reproduce this, at least not with the latest version of mlflow from master @trams

This has been fixed in https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/pull/6358 and can be closed.
```
with mlflow.start_run() as run:
  mlflow.log_param("test", "x"*501)

>>> MlflowException: INVALID_PARAMETER_VALUE: Param value for run id 2ee8cab33bfd4fdab8557b9caf577c71, 
exceeds size threshold 500 bytes. Key is test, value is 
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx...
````
